ISSUE.TITLE: Error code inconsistency between docs and API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The documentation states (for every endpoint which returns a single object) that for request with non-existing in database ID should return 404 code (Not Found), but it seems that API returns 400 (Bad Request) - is this a bug or typo in docs? Personally I think that 404 would be more logical and descriptive than generic 400. For https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/dragons/5e9d058759b1ff75a7ad5f8f API returns "Not Found" text and 400 error code: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26147774/87666641-4157fb80-c769-11ea-98d2-6f4985f1dab9.png)
